00077 #ifndef METAPHRASIS_H_
00078 #define METAPHRASIS_H_
00079 
00080 #include <gccore.h>
00081 #include <stdint.h>
00082 #include <malloc.h>
00083 #include <string.h>
00084 
00096 #define RGBA_TO_IA4(x) ((x & 0x0000f000) >> 8) | ((x & 0x000000f0) >> 4)
00097 #define RGBA_TO_IA8(x) x & 0x0000ffff
00098 #define RGBA_TO_RGB565(x) ((x & 0xf8000000) >> 16) | ((x & 0x00fc0000) >> 13) | ((x & 0x0000f800) >> 11)
00099 #define RGBA_TO_RGB555(x) ((x & 0xf8000000) >> 17) | ((x & 0x00f80000) >> 14) | ((x & 0x0000f800) >> 11) | 0x8000
00100 #define RGBA_TO_RGB444(x) ((x & 0xf0000000) >> 17) | ((x & 0x00f00000) >> 13) | ((x & 0x0000f000) >> 9) | ((x & 0x000000e0) >> 5)
00101 #define RGBA_TO_RGB5A3(x) (x & 0xff) < 0xe0 ? RGBA_TO_RGB444(x) : RGBA_TO_RGB555(x)
00102 
00103 class Metaphrasis {
00104         public:
00105                 Metaphrasis();
00106                 virtual ~Metaphrasis();
00107 
00108                 static uint32_t* convertBufferToI4(uint32_t* rgbaBuffer, uint16_t bufferWidth, uint16_t bufferHeight);
00109                 static uint32_t* convertBufferToI8(uint32_t* rgbaBuffer, uint16_t bufferWidth, uint16_t bufferHeight);
00110                 static uint32_t* convertBufferToIA4(uint32_t* rgbaBuffer, uint16_t bufferWidth, uint16_t bufferHeight);
00111                 static uint32_t* convertBufferToIA8(uint32_t* rgbaBuffer, uint16_t bufferWidth, uint16_t bufferHeight);
00112                 static uint32_t* convertBufferToRGBA8(uint32_t* rgbaBuffer, uint16_t bufferWidth, uint16_t bufferHeight);
00113                 static uint32_t* convertBufferToRGB565(uint32_t* rgbaBuffer, uint16_t bufferWidth, uint16_t bufferHeight);
00114                 static uint32_t* convertBufferToRGB5A3(uint32_t* rgbaBuffer, uint16_t bufferWidth, uint16_t bufferHeight);
00115                 
00116                 static uint8_t convertRGBAToIA4(uint32_t rgba);
00117                 static uint16_t convertRGBAToIA8(uint32_t rgba);
00118                 static uint16_t convertRGBAToRGB565(uint32_t rgba);
00119                 static uint16_t convertRGBAToRGB5A3(uint32_t rgba);
00120 
00121 };

00123 #endif /*METAPHRASIS_H_*/
